TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica si un servicio Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) se ejecuta, o se puede ejecutar, en un modo compatible con ASP.NET.

span.span: Specifies whether a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service runs, or can run, in a mode that is compatible with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] permite a los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] utilizar características ASP como suplantación de identidad.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode allows [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation. Está habilitado en el nivel de la aplicación a través del archivo Web.config y los archivos Web.config anidados en la aplicación no pueden invalidarlo.It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application. Cuando el no se especifica el valor de un servicio, que obtiene permitido de comportamiento de forma predeterminada.When the value is not specified for a service, it gets Allowed behavior by default. Para obtener más información, consulte [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md).For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). ## Examples Los desarrolladores de servicios pueden asegurarse de que su servicio sólo se ejecuta en modo de compatibilidad de ASP.NET estableciendo la propiedad en el en requerida tal como se muestra en el ejemplo siguiente:Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to Required as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Allowed = int32(1)

summary.span: Los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se pueden ejecutar en un dominio de aplicación con el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] establecido como o .

span.span: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode NotAllowed = int32(0)

summary.span: Los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se deben ejecutar en un dominio de aplicación con el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] establecido como .

span.span: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Required = int32(2)

summary.span: Los servicios [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se deben ejecutar en un dominio de aplicación con el modo de compatibilidad [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] establecido como .

span.span: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .
